Title: Are You The Reason Your Business Is Stuck?
Description:
Today, we’ll hear about:

•       What it looks like to transition from treadmill operator to pathfinder

•       Why it’s always worth investing in company culture

•       How to expand a business when family owns the property being rented

•       How to set boundaries for yourself on when to pull the plug on a business that isn’t profitable
